p: Delaying curative adjuvant chemotherapy can be considered within the accepted duration for each disease site 7 (e.g., adjuvant chemotherapy for stage III colorectal cancer can be safely delayed up to 8 weeks, but more than 12 weeks of delay is not recommended) 50. Recommendations for prioritization, treatment, and triage of patients with breast cancer during the COVID‐19 pandemic has been recently published 51.
